bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: New version of f26-backgrounds needs to be submitted for Beta release. It includes fixed default wallpaper improvement for animated default wallpapers
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 26.2.2
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.N/A 2. 3.
Actual results: Wrong version of default wallpaper
Expected results: Correct version of wallpaper
Additional info: Update status: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/f26-backgrounds-26.2.2-1.fc26

Proposed as a Freeze Exception for 26-beta by Fedora user luya using the blocker tracking app because:
This update fixed the correct version of default wallpaper and improve animated version as well. See https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/desktop@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/KEVBICKCGIRVFQOP244SEYCDDCEVDMJZ/
for further details

Discussed at 2017-05-22 blocker review meeting: [1].
This bug was accepted as Freeze Exception: We want to get this fixed for beta.
[1] https://meetbot-raw.fedoraproject.org/fedora-blocker-review/2017-05-22
f26-backgrounds-26.2.4-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9ab2094727

f26-backgrounds-26.2.4-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9ab2094727
